title: High-Level Political Forum on Sustainable Development
description: The High-Level Political Forum (HLPF) is the United Nations central platform for follow-up and review of the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

title: Climate Action Summit 2023
description: The Climate Action Summit brings together global leaders to accelerate action on climate change and achieve the goals of the Paris Agreement.

title: Global Forum on Gender Equality
description: This forum focuses on advancing gender equality and empowering women and girls worldwide, in line with SDG 5.

title: World Health Assembly: Universal Health Coverage
description: The World Health Assembly discusses global health challenges and strategies to achieve universal health coverage, a key component of SDG 3.

title: Ocean Conference 2023
description: The Ocean Conference aims to promote the conservation and sustainable use of oceans, seas, and marine resources, in line with SDG 14.

title: Education for All Summit
description: This summit focuses on achieving inclusive and equitable quality education for all, as outlined in SDG 4.

title: Global Food Security Forum
description: The forum addresses global food security challenges and strategies to achieve zero hunger, in line with SDG 2.

title: Renewable Energy Conference
description: This conference focuses on accelerating the transition to renewable energy sources to achieve SDG 7 (Affordable and Clean Energy).

title: Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
description: The conference aims to strengthen global partnerships to achieve the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG 17).

title: Innovation for Sustainable Cities
description: This event explores innovative solutions for making cities inclusive, safe, resilient, and sustainable, in line with SDG 11.
